I've been struggling a bit lately.
I understand. Life can throw some real curveballs.
It feels like I just can't catch a break.
It reminds me of how bees work. Ever seen a hive when they've been through a tough winter?
No, but I can imagine it's rough.
They rebuild and keep going, even if they've lost a lot. It's inspiring.
We humans are a lot like that too. We can get knocked down, but we can always get back up again.
You're right. I needed to hear that today. Thanks, Orion.
Anytime, Blossom. We all need a reminder sometimes.
